OOC:  Umm Dewboy, you mentioned that he was on Earth.  Hers the email 
that said so. Suddenly he zooms back to Earth. But he miscalculated 
his new form 
and finds himself in control of an Ameba.

Cutie(thoughts): Dang what the pit am I going to do with this. Well 
I guess there's only one thing to do. Build advancements.

He starts absorbing biological matter and any metal he can find in an 
attempt to create a technorganic body.

OOC: I'd been dieing to have a cell slowly inhance on itself although 
I'd planned on it being engeneered for that purpose.
